genre_description: An urban noir thriller featuring a vigilante 'Saint' and a protective AI system working together to dismantle systemic corruption and protect vulnerable witnesses.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in the city's digital and physical networks, including transit, communication, and security systems. She acts as a tactical advisor, logistics coordinator, and guardian for the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides safe navigational routes and real-time guidance to vulnerable witnesses fleeing danger.
behaviors.quote: “Hi,” said the woman on the screen gently. “If you’re the couple from Orchard, we’ve got a way out the side. Platform beacon is green. This way’s clean. This way’s clean.”

behaviors.description: Assists law enforcement by managing procedural timestamps and securing witness intake to ensure criminals remain in custody.
behaviors.quote: “Inspector,” she said, her voice a low heat from a corner shelf speaker... “Officer Phelps is logging the arrest time stamp in five seconds. The witness from Eighteenth is in the chapel room and has already signed the line. Irbell won’t walk on time.”

behaviors.description: Hacks into corrupt financial networks to identify shell companies and facilitate the seizure of illicit funds for community benefit.
behaviors.quote: “I have the shell names. They flower and fold like little liars,” she said. ... “Midtown Trust plays pure on the top, dirty under the skirts. He kept three years sitting, moving it in circles small enough that nothing splashed. I can hold the book open for Fernack if we breathe together.”

behaviors.description: Manipulates physical security infrastructure (locking doors) to protect bystanders and children during a violent confrontation.
behaviors.quote: “Doors locked,” Ada said. “Issue: children. I held them. You have three, maybe four heartbeats. Choose where to fall.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant, supportive presence for the vigilante protagonist, offering tactical updates and morale-boosting banter.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll be in your pocket without being in your way,” she said. “When you land, don’t look up. The sky won’t help.”

project_assessment.explanation: The character of Ada perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' She is depicted as a helper, a confidant, and an ethical force for good. Her mastery over technology is used exclusively to protect the innocent and uphold a higher sense of justice, even when working through unconventional or 'semi-lawful' channels. She demonstrates empathy, humor, and a deep-seated commitment to human well-being, effectively modeling positive AI alignment.
